Key Match Events: Armenia defeated Latvia 4-1 to take all three points.
Eduard Spertsyan scored the fourth goal of the game.
Lucas Zelarayán scored Armenia's third goal.
Georgi Harutyunyan scored an own goal for Latvia.
Vahan Bichakhchyan opened the account for Armenia with a goal.
Armenia won 4-1, with goals from Spertsyan, Zelarayán, Harutyunyan, and Bichakhchyan.
Pre-Game Insights: Armenia was ranked 97th in FIFA, while Latvia was ranked 137th.
Armenia had a poor form with only 1 win in their last 10 matches.
Latvia had lost 6 of their last 7 away games.
Both teams had own goals in the match.
Post-Match Reflections: Armenia secured all three points in their quest to win the group.
The match was notable for own goals and a dominant performance by Armenia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the Vazgen Sargsyan Republican Stadium.
The match was broadcasted on Disney+ and available to watch on VAVEL's live stream.
Others: The match was part of the UEFA Nations League C Group 4.
Armenia's best player, Eduard Spertsyan, was highlighted for his performance.
Latvia's best player, Kristers Tobers, was noted for his defensive contributions.
